B&M_SKU_JS: const metaViewport = document.createElement('meta'); metaViewport.setAttribute('name', 'viewport'); metaViewport.setAttribute('content', 'width=device-width, initial-scale=1'); document.head.appendChild(metaViewport); const rootCont = document.getElementById('root-content'); if (rootCont) { rootCont.style.marginTop = '-60px'; } const mainBar = document.getElementById('main-navbar'); if (mainBar) { mainBar.style.display = 'none'; } const Skalierung = document.getElementById('scale_form'); if (Skalierung) { Skalierung.style.display = 'none'; } const styleElement = document.createElement('style'); const cssCode = '.navbar-collapse.collapse { display: block !important; }'; styleElement.appendChild(document.createTextNode(cssCode)); document.head.appendChild(styleElement); const navbarHeader = document.querySelector('span.navbar-brand'); if (navbarHeader) { navbarHeader.remove(); } const element1 = document.getElementById('bs-example-navbar-collapse-1'); if (element1) { element1.style.margin = 'auto'; } const element = document.getElementById('id_input_info_form'); if (element) { Object.assign(element.style, { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'flex-start', justifyContent: 'space-between', marginInline: 'auto', marginBlock: 'auto' }); } const element2 = document.getElementById('id_input_field'); if (element2) { element2.style.width = '115%'; element2.focus(); } document.addEventListener('selectstart', event => event.preventDefault());
